name: Project_4
description:
Feature List:

PRESS 1, 2, or 3 on the Keyboard to change view of different projects!

(on 1) 

Click the screen to place a sphere. (Input = click Output: new sphere)

Press C to clear any created spheres.  (Input = press "c" Output: Clear all spheres created)

There is also a text box on screen that shows the current mouse position. 

On the bottom there is a slider that changes the color of created spheres. (Input: slider Output: new shade of red for spheres created) 

(On 2) 

A clock loads on screen, showing the current time. 

There is a button to show or remove the clock. (Input: Click "Show Clock" Output: Removes or shows the clock)

There is also a dropdown to change timezone one hour east or west, or back to the home time.  (Input: Click dropdown option   Output: Change timezone by 1hr depending on choice)

(On 3) 

There is a boy in his room with a rotating fan. The fan speed can be adjusted with a slider.  (Input: slider value.  Output: new speed for fan rotation)

On the left, there's a button which makes the boy do sit-ups or rest, depending on which mode he is in.   (Input: click "workout" button.  Output: Boy does sit-ups or stops doing sit-ups)

On the right, there is a functioning radio with a dropdown representing 3 stations (60s, 70s, and 80s music) with an option to turn the radio off. (Input: Dropdown options.  Output: Either music (60s, 70s, or 80s) or the radio is turned off and the music stops)
